options.name: management-roles
options.description: Manage who can manage permissions, and other configuration. Require administrator permissions.

options.name: add
options.description: Make a role a bot management role.

options.name: role
options.description: The role to make a bot management role.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a role from being a bot management role

options.name: role
options.description: The role to set the permission for

options.name: permissions
options.description: Manage bot level permissions. Requires being a manager on the bot.

options.name: set
options.description: Set a user's or a role's bot permission

options.name: target
options.description: The user or role to set the permission for

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to set the permission on. Leave empty to set the permission on the guild level.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a user's or a role's bot permission

options.name: target
options.description: The user or role to remove permissions for

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to remove the permissions on. Leave empty to remove the permissions on the guild level.

options.name: list
options.description: List all users and roles with bot permissions

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to list the permissions on. Leave empty to list the permissions on the guild level.

options.name: type-filter
options.description: Filter the set permissions by a specific type (user or role)

name: send
description: Send a message via the bot

options.name: channel
options.description: Channel to send the message to

options.name: tag
options.description: The name of the information you are trying to find.
